title: Yasuo during homeguard

embed.description: The most viral images on the internet, curated in real time by a dedicated community through commenting, voting and sharing.

body: so, recently i have noticed that when you purchase the homeguard enchantment on yasuo, during his running animation he runs with his sheathe facing forwards and his blade towards the ground, and i thought this looked a little out of place. can anyone shed some light as why someone would do this, or is this a design error?

replies.body:
Run animation.

Most champs have their run animations change when they hit a certain movement speed or higher.
yeah, but with yasuo's run animation, it looks like his blade and sheathe should be switched. if you look at the pictures, it will explain what i meant
Lel  this animation bug has been hanging around for like the last few patches so hopefully one day riot fixes this bug.
Ha, That looks so %%%%%%ed! Good how you found that out. Maybe Riot can fix that now
looks like he got a big dik
